__browser_unsupported__: Your browser is not supported anymore. Please update to a current version of Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari or any other brand.
__config_applicationhost_label_desc__:
The domain name under which this application runs. The setting affect all generated urls.
Use the placeholder {host} if you want to use the current server domain instead of a fixed one.
This allow you to have a multi-domain hosting.
__config_applicationhttps_label_desc__: This application runs with https. The setting affect all generated urls. They will include https:// or http://, depending on this setting.
__config_applicationurlbasepath_label_de: When your app run in a subfolder of your document root folder, then put the url path in here. Example: /subfolder
__config_captchakeys_recaptchav2_private:
This is used to generate captchas for logins and other forms that require captcha solving.
See https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/
__config_captchakeys_recaptchav2_publick:
This is used to generate captchas for logins and other forms that require captcha solving.
See https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/
__config_captchakeys_recaptchav3_private:
This is used to generate captchas for logins and other forms that require captcha solving.
See https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/
__config_captchakeys_recaptchav3_publick:
This is used to generate captchas for logins and other forms that require captcha solving.
See https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/
__config_captchatype_label_desc__: You can choose between different captcha solving types. If you choose none, captcha solving is disabled everywhere.
__config_emailbodytemplate_label_desc__: Give your e-mail a layout. This textarea accept html.{body} is the actual content placeholder to be inserted by the application
__config_emailoverriderecipient_label__: Route every e-mail to this e-mail
__config_emailoverriderecipient_label_de:
This does effectively route EVERY outgoing e-mail to this given e-mail.
That should only be set for local development environments or debugging purposes.
__config_emailtitletemplate_label_desc__:
For example if you always want to prepend/append some text
Example: "{title} - Fixed text"
{title} is the title placeholder to be inserted by the application
__config_errorlogdisk_label_desc__:
The error can later be viewed in developer options -> Logs
This is recommended.
Attention: This logs can contain very sensible data. Read above extended log option.
__config_errorlogemail_label_desc__:
Send an error to the given e-mail address.
This is recommended.
After changing this, you will get a test error e-mail to this address.
Attention: This logs can contain very sensible data. Read above extended log option.
__config_errorlogextended_label_desc__:
If true, then log all data that is know to the system.
Include current request, server data, user session, and more.
Attention: This contains very sensible data and affect all log options bellow
__config_errorlogsyslog_label_desc__:
Log error to your systems syslog.
Attention: This logs can contain very sensible data. Read above extended log option.
__config_languagedefaultuser_label__: Detect default language automatically based on user preference
__config_languagedefaultuser_label_desc_: If activated, the system will try to detect the default language based on users browser preferences. If no supported language is found, then it will use the systems default language.
__config_languagefallback_label_desc__: If a language key with the default language is not found, or the key is untranslated, then it will use the translation value from this fallback.
__config_languagemultiple_label_desc__:
This will allow the user to choose between supported languages.
Attention: Once you have a running application and you disable multilanguage, ALL existing URLs are invalid, because the language is not contained in the URL anymore. Effectively making all existing google entries, bookmarks, etc... invalid. Never do disable this in production when it was activated before.
__config_languagessupported_label_desc__:
The user can choose between these languages.
Attention: Once you have a running application and you remove a supported language, all URLs containing the now deleted language are invalid and throw a not found error for the user. This will remove all those URLs from google for example. It is recommended to never remove a language, only adding is safe.
__config_logincaptcha_label__: Login forms does require a solved captcha
__config_logincaptcha_label_desc__:
Attention: Verify the backend login in a second incognito tab before you logout here.In case you have a problem with the keys bellow, you not will be able to login again.
You then must manually unset the flag in config-editable.php on the command-line.
__config_systemeventlog_1_label__: Log every action that create a new database entry
__config_systemeventlog_2_label__: Log every action that modify a database entry
__config_systemeventlog_3_label__: Log every action that delete a database entry
__config_systemeventlog_labeldesc__: The following logs are system info logs which are independent of above options. This logs can be viewed in the logs menu.
__framelix_backupreestore__:
Here you can download a backup of your current configuration or you can restore your configuration from a backup file.
Attention: This backup only contains configuration data, no database data or source code.
__framelix_config_missing_forms_file__: This module doesn't have a config/config-editable-form.php file
__framelix_configuration_module_email_ma: PHP mail (Must be configured in php.ini)
__framelix_configuration_warning__:
Attention: Any change to this configuration values will immediately be applied. Make sure you always have a backup of your configuration file.
Also make sure you have access to the command-line to edit the config-editable.php file, in case you you kill the application by misconfiguration.
__framelix_error_access_denied__: Sorry. Your are not allowed to view this page.
__framelix_error_invalid_url__: The requested page is missing some required parameters
__framelix_form_2fa_backup_code_used__: You have used a one time backup code for your 2-factor authentication. This code cannot be used anymore.
__framelix_form_2fa_usebackup__: Or click here to use one of your backup codes
__framelix_form_file_delete_existing__:
Delete file from database
You must store this form to delete the file
__framelix_form_file_pick__: Pick a file, or drag & drop a file in here
__framelix_form_validation_captcha_inval: Couldn't verify captcha, please try again
__framelix_form_validation_captcha_verif: Your device has been successfully verified
__framelix_form_validation_email__: This need to be a correct e-mail address
__framelix_form_validation_invaliddate__: This is not a valid date
__framelix_form_validation_maxdate__: The date cannot be greater than {date}
__framelix_form_validation_maxgridrows__: A maximum of {{number=1:entry|number=*:entries}} entries are allowed
__framelix_form_validation_maxlength__: The text cannot be longer than {{number=1:character|number=*:characters}}
__framelix_form_validation_maxselectedfi: A maximum of {{number=1:file|number=*:files}} can be selected
__framelix_form_validation_maxselectedit: A maximum of {{number=1:option|number=*:options}} can be selected
__framelix_form_validation_maxtime__: The time cannot be greater than {time}
__framelix_form_validation_mindate__: The date cannot be less than {date}
__framelix_form_validation_minlength__: The text cannot be less than {{number=1:character|number=*:characters}} long
__framelix_form_validation_mintime__: The time cannot be less than {time}
__framelix_form_validation_required__: This field needs to be filled out
__framelix_form_validation_twofactor__: The entered code is not valid
__framelix_https_required__: This feature is only available on secure applications that support https/ssl. Your application administrator have to enable https with a valid SSL certificate in order to make this feature work.
__framelix_login_invalid_fido2__: E-Mail does not exist, not have enabled a Fido2 auth or your device has not enabled a Fido2 auth for this e-mail
__framelix_login_invalid_user__: E-Mail and/or password does not match
__framelix_modified_timestamp_updated__: This entry has been modified after it has been created
__framelix_password_notcorrect__: Your current password is not correct
__framelix_password_verify__: Please enter your password for this secured area
__framelix_quick_search_help__:
Use * to search everything
Use ** to search everything and start on next pageload automatically
Use >50, >=50, =50, !=50, <50, <=50 to search values greather/equal/lower then 50
Use ~hello to search values containing hello (Which is the default even without ~)
Use !~hello to search values not containing hello
Use "hello friend" to search for the full sentence "hello friend"
Use hello && bye to find entries which contain both words (Default is either or)
Use settings icon to search only in specific fields
__framelix_quick_search_placeholder__: Type here and press enter to search. Use * to find all.
__framelix_quick_search_settings__: Extended settings - Choose specific fields to search in
__framelix_setup_description__:
Hello fellow administrator!
We guide you through the initial setup for this application.
Just follow the steps on screen.
Shall we begin?
__framelix_setup_developer_desc__: If enabled, you have a special menu for developer options
__framelix_setup_finish_description__:
Ok. Now it's about time to let some magic happen and let the system self setup from now.
This may take several moments.
If you are ready, hit the button!
__framelix_setup_phpexecutable_desc__:
The path to the executable php command line.
It should already be prefilled when the best matching path.
__framelix_simulateuser__:
Simulate this user
You basically interact in the same way as this user can
You see/not see everything that this user see
Database actions still log your original user in create and update information
__framelix_simulateuser_info__: You are viewing this page as simulated user {0}
__framelix_systemvalues_active_form_labe:
Active entries can be selected in edit forms.
Inactive entries will not be selectable anymore.
__framelix_table_rendering__: The table is rendering... Please wait...
__framelix_toast_count__: Number of messages in the queue
__framelix_user_edituser_validation_admi: There is always at least one, non locked, administrator account that must exist.
__framelix_user_flag_locked_desc__: If activated, the user is instantly locked and cannot login anymore.
__framelix_view_backend_dev_updatedataba: Schema hash has changed. Please reload the page and try again.
There are no database changes pending. Good work, master.
Safe queries to only create new columns/tables

Unsafe queries which modify/delete existing columns
Attention: Only execute the queries when you are sure your data don't get lost. Always make a backup before this action.
__framelix_view_backend_dev_updatesource: Run Database update after source update
There are unsafe queries the need to be executed. Head to the db update page.
There are no changes pending. Nicely done, fellow.
Update to current SVN head revision
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_m:
You have requested a password reset of your account at {0}.
Please open the following link to reset your password
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_r: You have set your new password. You can now login with this new password.
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_s: If the email '{0}' exist, we have sent you a verification email. This mail must be opened within the next hour.
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_t: The verification token is invalid. Please try again.
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_2fa_: If you want to link a new second factor device, you have to disable 2FA and then link both devices at the same time, with the same QR code code.
Are you sure? This will now deactivate and invalidate all your 2-factor features!

After you have scanned the QR Code, enter the 6-digits code from the app bellow. If you have entered the correct code, the window will close automatically and from now on you have the second factor enabled.

You can now scan this QR code with your authenticator app. We recommend Google Authenticator, andOTP or Twilio.
Also download and save your backup codes, in case your authenticator app get lost.
Choose a name for your authenticator app

With 2-Factor Authentication you can enable a more secure login progress, which then require a second factor (TOTP - One Time Password) every time you login. Once enabled, you should have your backup codes stored in a secure place, in case your second factor device get's lost. Otherwise, when you loose your second factor and when you loose your backup codes, you cannot login anymore.
Create and download new backup codes
Are you sure? This will disable all previous backup codes!
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_emai: This e-mail is the same as you already have
On this page you can change your e-mail. You will get an e-mail on your old and your new address, which both contains a verification link that you must open.

You have requested a email change of your account at {0}.
Please open the following link to verify the e-mail change
We have sent an e-mail to both addresses. Please open the verification link from both e-mails to verify your account.
Error. Verification link is invalid. You must open the link within 1 hour after the change request.
Step 1 done. Please open the second verification link from the other e-mail address. You can close this window now.
Step 2 done. your new e-mail address is now {0}. You can close this window now.
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_fido: If you login with FIDO2, you not need a second factor, even if 2-Factor Authentication is enabled. FIDO2 is already considered really secure and is device bound, which effectively is the second factor.
You have already enabled FIDO2 for this device
Missing correct WebAuthnId. Please repeat the process.
Enable FIDO2 on this device now

With FIDO2 you can enable secure web logins like Fingerprint Login, Hardware Token Login, etc... on this device. After you have activated this feature, you can still login with your password but you can also login with your second secure login method. You can delete each added FIDO2 device, which disable the advanced login functionality for this device.
Authentication successfully added. You can now login with this authentication method.
Sorry. FIDO2 is not supported on this device/browser.
__framelix_view_loading__: This view is loading... Please wait...
__stop_edit_tooltip__: Will revert all unsaved data and redirect you to create a new entry
__user_role_admin__: Administrator - Is allowed to do everything
